subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The recent deaths of George Steinbrenner and Bob Sheppard added resonance to Old-Timers’ Day, which was held without perhaps the Yankees’ most beloved living icon, Yogi Berra.
snippet: The recent deaths of George Steinbrenner and Bob Sheppard added resonance to Old-Timers’ Day, which was held without perhaps the Yankees’ most beloved living icon, Yogi Berra.
